timeline.bodyText: If we are to include the basefee shouldn't we require the header have the base fee?  Or does the spec allow it to be absent?  i.e. if we include base fee should an absent base fee be marked as invalid?
timeline.author: shemnon

replies.bodyText: Yes you are right. The spec does not allow it to be absent. So i will do the change to make it required if the boolean is set to true.
replies.author: abdelhamidbakhta

timeline.bodyText: Does the basefee increase always at an increment or does it scale per the over/under?  I think a test case where we have the same parent fee but 5 gas used (way more, more, same, less, way less) would be good here to show that whatever the case is.
